title: Bloomer
summary: Vietnam-based social entertainment app focused on photo sharing and themed contests.
description:
Bloomer was a Vietnam-based social entertainment app focused on photo sharing and discovery, built around themed contests and community rankings.

Users could join country/city and theme-based contests, upload photos, and climb leaderboards by receiving "Flowers" (a social currency) to boost rankings and engagement.

The platform also partnered with brands and media projects to run sponsored contests and casting campaigns.
responsibilities: Implemented and maintained key client-side features for the photo feed, contest participation flow, and leaderboard experiences.
Built UI screens and reusable components for contest browsing, photo submission, ranking states, and user profile presentation.
Improved performance and stability for media-heavy screens (image loading, scrolling smoothness, memory usage) on mobile devices.
Collaborated with product/ops to support sponsored contests and time-bound events, ensuring reliable rollout and safe iteration.

highlights.label: Core loop
highlights.value: Post photos → receive Flowers → climb rankings
